name: Cosmic Kitchen
description:
This game was made for Game Endeavor Jam #3. The theme was duality.

Play as a cook who has been tasked with serving up some tasty food to the two titans of the universe. Make sure to keep both of them satisfied otherwise they'll eat up Earth instead.

--- Instructions---

Follow the recipes for each respective titan, and serve them their food by cooking it up with your trusty flamethrower and throwing it into their mouths. Make sure to follow the recipes in order (left-to-right for the purple titan and left-to-right for the orange titan). Make three mistakes (miss an order or mess up an order) and you'll have to kiss Earth goodbye!

--- Controls ---

W,A,S,D or Arrow Keys - Movement

E - Pick Up and Put Down cooked food

Left Mouse Click - Use Flamethrower or throw picked up food

Right Mouse Click - Dash
